thread.title: Lackey dominates, Cardinals beat Cubs 4-0 in NLDS opener (Yahoo Sports)
thread.title_full: Lackey dominates, Cardinals beat Cubs 4-0 in NLDS opener (Yahoo Sports)

author: ASFN Admin
title: Lackey dominates, Cardinals beat Cubs 4-0 in NLDS opener (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,166 Lackey dominates, Cardinals beat Cubs 4-0 in NLDS opener (Yahoo Sports) ST. LOUIS (AP) -- John Lackey outpitched old teammate Jon Lester, allowing two hits into the eighth inning, and rookies Tommy Pham and Stephen Piscotty each homered late as the St. Louis Cardinals cooled off the Chicago Cubs with a 4-0 victory Friday night in the opener of their NL Division Series.
